keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The directive, known as the “dark money” executive order, would mandate that government contractors publicly report their contributions to groups that spend money to influence campaigns.

headline.print_headline: Obama May Require Federal Contractors to List Campaign Gifts
headline.main: President Obama May Require Federal Contractors to List Campaign Gifts

snippet: The directive, known as the “dark money” executive order, would mandate that government contractors publicly report their contributions to groups that spend money to influence campaigns.
abstract: Pres Obama is pondering executive order that would require companies that contract with federal government to report their political contributions to groups that spend money to influence campaigns.
